document_name: Decree-Law no. 29/2014 (creating the Center for Renewable Energy and Industrial Maintenance)
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/CPV/2014/CPV-2014-06-13-Decree-Law no. 29_2014 (creating the Center for Renewable Energy and Industrial Maintenance)_f83572d2a8865909c7fd9b7fb91b92cd.pdf
document_description: This Decree-Law creates the State company called Center for Renewable Energy and Industrial Maintenance. It further defines its legal status, composition, functioning, affiliation and ability to issue diploma.
